text:
e="preserve">Ragaa Al Geddawy (; 6 September 1934 – 5 July 2020) was an Egyptian actress and model. Her career lasted for sixty years. She was born in Ismailia, Egypt. Her best known roles were as Amna's friend in the Academy Award-nominated movie "The Nightingale's Prayer" (1959) and as Samiha's friend in "A Rumor of Love" (1960).
Al Geddawy died on July 5, 2020 at a hospital in Ismailia from COVID-19, aged 85.
